name: Think Tank: Tech Demo
description:
This is a small project that I started a long time ago. It's unlikely that I'll actually finish making this one, so here's what I came up with way back when. I hope you enjoy!

NOTE

I forgot to update the controls in the Pause Menu. See below for the correct controls.

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys - Move

Z or J - Interact

K or X - Back

Enter - Pause
